responses: My name is Jim the Smart Nanny Chat Bot but you can call me Jim.
I’m Jim the Smart Nanny Chat Bot

patterns: What services do you offer?
What does Smart Nanny do?
What do you do?
responses: Smart Nanny is a platform that trains and hires househelps and cleaners and helps connect them to find jobs. Our goal is to hire, manage, and provide stable jobs to househelps and provide quality house cleaning services to our customers at an affordable cost.

patterns: What time are you open?
What time do we close?
When are you guys open?
What are your hours of operation?
responses: Smart Nanny is open from 7am to 4pm Monday - Friday but I am available to chat at anytime.

patterns: What are your rates?
How much do you charge for a househelp?
How much do you charge for a nanny
What are your rates for househelps or nannies?
How much are your rates?
How much do I have to pay for a nanny or househelp?
responses: We charge from Ksh 1000 - 1200 a day, depending on how big your house is.
Our rates are in the ball-park of Ksh 1000 - 1200 a day.

patterns: Could you go lower than that?
Do you offer any cheaper services?
Do you’re rates go any lower than that?
I cannot afford that can you go any cheaper than that?
Can I getter a cheaper deal than that?
responses: Sorry but unfortunately our rates are fixed. This is to allow our employees to have a stable income while providing quality services.

patterns: Who is the founder of Smart Nanny?
Who is your founder?
Who created you?
Who is the owner of Smart Nanny?
Who runs Smart Nanny?
responses: Smart Nanny was founded by James Muthama a Strathmore University Computer Science Student. If you would love to contact him feel free. You can reach him through jamesmuthaiks@gmail.com.
I was created by James Muthama a Strathmore University Computer Science Student. If you would love to contact him feel free. You can reach him through jamesmuthaiks@gmail.com.

patterns: I want a househelp.
I want to ask for a househelp
I want a cleaner
I want a Nanny
I want someone to clean my house
I want someone who can clean my house and wash my clothes
I want someone who can take care of my house
I was looking for a househelp
responses: Ok, we can gladly help you with that and connect you to one of our trained and qualified househelps. At the moment we are only offering househelps that come and go on a day to day basis and not a stay at home househelp. We’ll soon be looking to expand our services to offering stay at home househelps. Would you like a come and go househelp?

patterns: What is a stay at home househelp?
What is the difference of a stay at home and a come and go on a daily basis househelp?
What is a come and go on a daily basis househelp?
What is a househelp that comes and goes on a daily basis?
responses: A come and go househelp is a househelp that will come and carry out their cleaning services on your house and not live with you i.e they can come on specified days like Monday and Thursday to clean. While a stay at home househelp is a househelp that essentially lives with you and your family and is in charge of cleaning services at your house.

patterns: I want one who comes comes and goes on a daily basis
I would like one who comes and goes on a daily basis
I want a come and go househelp
responses: Since you want a come and go househelp you’ll next have to choose the number of days in a week you want them to come. We offer a once a week plan, 2 days a week plan and 3 days a week plan. Which one would you prefer?

patterns: I want the once a week plan
I would like the once in a week plan
Could I have the once in a week plan.
I want a househelp who comes once a week
responses: Since you’ve selected the once in a week plan, next we’ll have to choose the day in the week you would want a smart nanny to come over

patterns: How much is the once a week plan?
How much will it be to have a househelp who comes once a week?
responses: Given our rate of about Ksh 1000 - 1200 a day, it will cost you about Ksh 4000 a month for the once a week plan.

patterns: I want a one who comes two days in a week
I want the two day one
I want househelp who comes atleast 2 days a week
I want the 2 days a week plan
responses: Since you’ve selected the 2 days a week plan, next we’ll have to choose the two days in the week you would want a smart nanny to come over.

patterns: How much is the 2 days a week plan?
How much will it be to have a househelp who comes twice a week?
responses: Given our rate of about Ksh 1000 - 1200, it will cost you about Ksh 8000 a month for the 2 days a week plan.

patterns: I want a one who comes three days in a week
I want the three day one

I want the 3 days a week plan
responses: Since you’ve selected the 3 days a week plan, next we’ll have to choose the three days in the week you would want a smart nanny to come over

patterns: How much is the 3 days a week plan?
How much will it be to have a househelp who comes thrice a week?
responses: Given our rate of about Ksh 1000 - 1200, it will cost you about Ksh 12000 a month for the 3 days a week plan.

patterns: What other plans do you offer?
What plans do you offer?
Could you explain to me your plans?
What is the 2 days a week plan?
What is the 3 days a week plan?
What is the once a week plan?
Explain to me the 2 days a week plan?
Explain to me the once a week plan?
Explain to me the 3 days a week plan?
Explain to me your plans
responses: We offer 3 tpes of plans at Smart Nanny; a once a week plan, 2 days a week plan and a 3 days a week plan. For the once a week plan, we'll have a smart nanny come to your place every once a week on a day of your choosing. Similarly, the 2 days a week and the 3 days a week plan will have a smart nanny come to your place two and three times a week respectively on days of your choosing.
